## DeliveryContentResolver interface

Service interface that allows to resolve a rendering context given its ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DeliveryContentResolver 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getDeliveryContentItem(aID)](./component-api.deliverycontentresolver.getdeliverycontentitem.md) | Resolves a rendering context given the ID of the item |
